{"name": "Self-Service DTA Kiosk at Somerville Council on Aging (limited services available)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Parking**
* There is parking available onsite.

**Services**
* There is an official Department of Transitional Assistance Kiosk at this location with access to the DTA Connect mobile application and website. [Learn what you can do through DTA Connect.](https://www.mass.gov/guides/how-to-contact-dta)


***NOTE:*** These locations are not staffed by DTA employees.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mass.gov/locations/self-service-dta-kiosk-at-somerville-council-on-aging-limited-services-available", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "167 Holland Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Teele Square", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02144", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4011104, "longitude": -71.125408}, "phones": [{"number": "(877) 382-2363", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}]}
